title: Met Gala: Lizzo bows down to 'idol' Sir James Galway in flute duet
description: The US star paid tribute to her "idol" Sir James Galway after he performed with her at the Met Gala.

title: Local elections 2023: Polls to open across England
description: Voters will head to the polls later on Thursday for the biggest round of elections since 2019.

title: New mums missing out on mental health services, report finds
description: A report says the NHS is failing to meet targets around services for pregnant women and new mums.

title: Manchester City 3-0 West Ham: Erling Haaland breaks Premier League goals record

title: Sudan: Dozens on last UK evacuation flights to leave the country

title: Liverpool 1-0 Fulham: Mohamed Salah scores for eighth straight Anfield game
description: Liverpool's outside hopes of qualifying for next season's Champions League remain alive after Mohamed Salah continues his remarkable Anfield scoring form to help sink Fulham.

title: Sir Richard Branson thought 'we were going to lose everything' in pandemic

title: Ryder Cup: Sergio Garcia, Ian Poulter & Lee Westwood ineligible for 2023 event after quitting DP World Tour
description: Sergio Garcia, Ian Poulter and Lee Westwood will be ineligible to play in this year's Ryder Cup after resigning from the DP World Tour.
